segments.text: I feel so bad for the woman because she’s going to have a huge mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be really upset when she finally realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery, and someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids will ever get caught or if they’ll get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene just makes me feel sorry for the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is spilling out and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to have a lot of cleaning to do after this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids don’t seem to care about the mess they’re making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a sad situation all around.
segments.speaker: PAR
